column4: Fix some bugs of AI and delete useless code
fix CRLF translation issue
Fix CRLF issues
fix incompatibility bug with moveToxxx() functions from merge
added the possiblity to set sd card to mounted fixing bug with RawResourceLoader.java where just the /raw directory was accessible
Modified ShadowPendingIntent  Added isActivityIntent() and isBroadcastIntent() + a bugfix where the private field isServiceIntent will never be set
fixing build error in shadow sqliteDatabase
Fixes problem where attr defs were not found on resource path.
Merge pull request #23 from square/ray/fix-missing-attrs  Fixes problem where attr defs were not found on resource path.
Fixes problem where we explode if a res dir lacks a values subdir. Also simplifies resource path mechanism  avoiding redundant parsing of system resources.
Fixes problem where we explode if a res dir lacks a values subdir. Also simplifies resource path mechanism  avoiding redundant parsing of system resources.
Merge pull request #27 from square/ray/values-not-required  Fixes problem where we explode if a res dir lacks a values subdir.
Merge pull request #191 from roberttaylor426/master  Fixed maxLength bug introduced into ShadowEditText
Fixed maxLength bug in ShadowEditText
Fix compile error for ant build
Merge pull request #1377 from robolectric/ry4n1m3/debug-travis  Add cleanup to ContentResolverTest to remove some test pollution.
Merge pull request #1378 from robolectric/ry4n1m3/debug-travis  Fix Travis test failures in WindowTest.
Fix bug with throwing an Exception within a Runnable  Throwing an Exception in a Runnable no longer leaves Scheduler in an inconsistant state  causing further Runnables to never be run.
Fix Java 8 javadoc warnings and errors.
Fix ShadowObjectAnimator broken pre API 21.  https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/1473  Remove shadowed target field and use the real objects property via its accessor instead.
Adds actions to shadow notification builder  Adds actions to ShadowNotification only at this time. Issue with RemoteViews null bitmap cache must be resolve before calling through to real buider.
Fix Sonatype SNAPSHOT deployment issues.
Updated to support per-DataSource MediaInfo in  static state a la Exceptions and ShadowMediaMetadataRetriever. Fixed Javadoc errors.
Fix classpath unit tests  This fixes unit test errors caused by different path separators on Windows operating systems.
Merge pull request #1526 from tomlu/fix-sync-issue  Add synchronization to ShadowMessageQueue.
Added test coverage to getConstructor() calls and fixed latent bug in the String version.
Merge pull request #1560 from spotify/issue-1559-bind-to-shadow-application  fix for #1559. Adding missing super.unbindService call in ShadowService
Merge pull request #1558 from spotify/issue-1557-bound-services-list  fix for #1557. Adding getBoundedServiceConnections()
Merge pull request #1562 from spotify/issue-1561-multiple-service-connections  Fixing #1561. Adding Intent->SerivceConnectionData mapping
Merge pull request #1571 from sfrdmn/compile-error-fix  Remove duplicate RoboCursor.getCount definition
Moved variants to configuration. Fixed issue if lib plugin is used
Merge pull request #1593 from holmari/master  Fix performance issues caused by 8d15a25dcbb23

Fix bug introduced in df98189.  Add shadow for NfcAdapter.getNfcAdapter(). NfcManager needs calling with a context as its constructor parameter otherwise it is not initialized correctly.  Add support for NfcAdapter.setNdefPushMessageCallback() and a non-android accessor so the callback can be executed in tests.  Closes #1614.
Convert URL to URI to fix problem with spaces converted to %20
Merge pull request #710 from SuperJugy/FixSQLiteSpacesIssue  Convert URL to URI to fix problem with spaces converted to %20
Fix Java 8 doclet issues.
Merge pull request #1706 from DanielGrech/bugfix/guard_against_null_log_messages  Guard against null tag and message being passed to Log class.
Fix issue where @Config does not override 'constants' defined in robolectric.properties.  Closes #1697. Closes #1707.
Added swapCursor method and protected findColumnsFromCursor against null Cursor. This fixes issue robolectric/robolectric#1677
Merge pull request #762 from kevbry/fix_uri_issue  Fix uri issue
Set default locale for Robolectric's test runner to English to avoid number localization issues. Fixes #737
Issue #1711: automatically execute runnables when not paused. Also fixed bug where clock was not advancing while idling.
Merge pull request #1727 from kriegfrj/nested-posts-1711  Fix for issue #1711: automatically execute runnables when not paused
Issue #1711: automatically execute runnables when not paused. Also fixed bug where clock was not advancing while idling.
Issue #1711: automatically execute runnables when not paused. Also fixed bug where clock was not advancing while idling.
Fixed indentation issue
Solves issue #1824. Create application meta data if they are null.
Fixed bug in winemvn path.

Updated Travis Updated Gradle Updated project to Android 22 Updated Robolectric to 3.0-rc3 Updated Unit Test Updated Gradle to 2.4 Updated all plugins #Issue 80 - Upgraded espresso #Issue 54 - fixed maven artifact #Issue 31 - updated build.gradle
Converted over to robolectric  and fixed a bug with issue https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-gradle-plugin/issues/145
Fix bug in ShadowMatrix.setScale that was not saving the correct argument.  Closes #1885.
Merge pull request #1904 from robolectric/shadow-matrix-set-scale  Fix bug in ShadowMatrix.setScale
Fix bug in ShadowMatrix.setScale that was not saving the correct argument.  Closes #1885.
Resolve error for JDK 7

Remove unneeded startActivity() method from ShadowActivity  The startActivity() method merely delegates to startActivityForResult()  so there is no point in having it shadowed as well. This fixes the issue of overridden startActivityForResult() not being triggered by calls to startActivity()  as happens in the framework.

Remove unneeded startActivity() method from ShadowActivity  startActivity() merely delegates to startActivityForResult()  so there is no point in having it shadowed as well. This fixes the issue of overridden startActivityForResult() not being triggered by calls to startActivity()  as happens in the framework.
Fix error.
Fix javadoc errors in ShadowIntent
Merge pull request #2032 from pivotal-oscar/fix_javadoc  Fix javadoc errors in ShadowIntent
[Fix Bug] permission info may not be parsed in service and reciver
fixing bugs in shadowAccessibiltyNodeInfo
Fixed an overflow bug in ScheduledRunnable.compareTo() which messed up sorting for time values with large differences.
Merge pull request #2072 from kriegfrj/scheduler-overflow  Fixed an overflow bug in ScheduledRunnable.compareTo()
Fixing bugs in shadowAccessibiltyNodeInfo
Merge pull request #2067 from yuzhong-google/master  Fixing bugs in ShadowAccessibiltyNodeInfo
Merge pull request #2081 from pivotal-oscar/fix_javadoc_error  Demote cross dependency links in javadocs that cannot be resolved
The problem is on the URL.toURI() function  apply fixes as recommend from below stackoverflow. http://stackoverflow.com/q/4494063

Improve handling of ordered broadcasts  In fixing the attached issues  I had to change around the implementation of ordered broadcasts. This fixed a few other issues - ordered broadcasts sent to receivers with custom schedulers now execute serially  and they propagate results along with them.  Fixes #2112 Fixes #1973
Fixed Date picker getBestDateTimePattern bug
Upgrade Robolectric to resolve isssue with thread scheduler  https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/1740
Fixed Date picker getBestDateTimePattern bug
Fixed Date picker getBestDateTimePattern bug
Merge pull request #2170 from sjanic/master  Fixed Date picker getBestDateTimePattern bug

Fix install-dependencies.rb maps version  The correct version string should look like "18_r4"  not just "4".  This bug was introduced in bf4f3aa (issue #1968 / PR #2092) by accident.  Note that this also intentionally uses #{revision} instead of the shell version did. (This resulted in the previous version actually trying to install to filenames with "4?" instead of "4".)
bug fix for shadowA11yNodeInfo
bug fix for shadowA11yNodeInfo  This appears to happen in DateIntervalFormat.toSkeleton() where the date format is constructed.  Fixes #2194
bug fix for shadowA11yNodeInfo
bug fix for shadowA11yNodeInfo
Merge pull request #2193 from yuzhong-google/master  Bug fix for shadowA11yNodeInfo
Fixed an overflow bug in ScheduledRunnable.compareTo() which messed up sorting for time values with large differences.
bug fix for shadowAccessibilityNodeInfo
Merge pull request #2202 from yuzhong-google/master  bug fix for shadowAccessibilityNodeInfo

Fix install-dependencies.rb maps version  The correct version string should look like "18_r4"  not just "4".  This bug was introduced in bf4f3aa (issue #1968 / PR #2092) by accident.  Note that this also intentionally uses #{revision} instead of the shell version did. (This resulted in the previous version actually trying to install to filenames with "4?" instead of "4".)
Fix databinding with android gradle plugin. Fixes https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2143
Fixed an overflow bug in ScheduledRunnable.compareTo() which messed up sorting for time values with large differences.

Fixes for #1306: Moved main thread and master scheduler access from RuntimeEnvironment to Scheduler. Changed instrumenting class loader so as not to acquire Scheduler. Changed plans so that instrumented methods block the master scheduler if executed on the main thread. Enhanced regression test to catch new issue raised by karlicoss posts from background thread not executing.
fix shadows per https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/1862 until Robolectric releases 3.1
updated formatDateTime test for M which exposed the issue  fixed locale issue

extended ShadowSettings to include getStringForUser(...)  updated formatDateTime test for M which exposed the issue  fixed locale issue  Added ShadowTelephonyManager#{get set}CellLocation.  Tests pass when running ./scripts/install-robolectric.sh

extended ShadowSettings to include getStringForUser(...)  updated formatDateTime test for M which exposed the issue  fixed locale issue  Added ShadowTelephonyManager#{get set}CellLocation.  Tests pass when running ./scripts/install-robolectric.sh  Added ShadowTelephonyManager#{get set}CellLocation.  Tests pass when running ./scripts/install-robolectric.sh
Theme resource issues resolved
Fix https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric-gradle-plugin/issues/144
Implement PackageManager.getNameForUid(); (#2469)  Fixes: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2439

Fixed nasty bug of ManifestFactory memoization causing test order to impact test results when the same ManifestIdentity (manifest file combined with libs  resourceDir  etc.) were used using different names  e.g. 'TestAndroidManifest.xml' and './TestAndroidManifest.xml'.

Fixed nasty bug of ManifestFactory memoization causing test order to impact test results when the same ManifestIdentity (manifest file combined with libs  resourceDir  etc.) were used using different names  e.g. 'TestAndroidManifest.xml' and './TestAndroidManifest.xml'.

Add Detection for Maven/Gradle in RobolectricTestRunner to Replace RobolectricGradleTestRunner (#2494)  * Fixed nasty bug of ManifestFactory memoization causing test order to impact test results when the same ManifestIdentity (manifest file combined with libs  resourceDir  etc.) were used using different names  e.g. 'TestAndroidManifest.xml' and './TestAndroidManifest.xml'.
Fixes crash reporting interference with Robolectric  Read more here: https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/1564 .
When parsing meta-data if value refers to a non-existant resource throw ResourceNotFoundException rather than NPE  Fixes ambiguity in https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2540

Add support to get and add smallest screen width to qualifiers.  Set the default to "sw320dp" - this fixes the bug where by using smallest screen width resources will fail because 0 is the current default for screen width
fix: fix unit test resource not found error  See https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/1733

chore: add code coverage (#3)  * chore: add code coverage  * chore: use jacoco android plugin instead  * fix: fix unit test resource not found error  See https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/1733

Fix small bug in XmlResourceParserImpl.getAttributeName() that was incorrectly comparing the wrong name space causing attribute name look-ups to resolve incorrectly  i.e: with the namespace prefix for non-android packages in some cases. This would in turn make the name-to-resourceId lookup fail.
Merge pull request #2620 from jongerrish/fix_xml_resource_parser_impl_get_attribute_name  Fix small bug in XmlResourceParserImpl.getAttributeName()
Add MEDIA_SESSION_SERVICE to the list of SystemServices  Fixes issue https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2633
Add MEDIA_SESSION_SERVICE to the list of SystemServices  Fixes issue https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2633
Fix bug where by StyleData was incorrectly matching an android attribute with an application attribute of the same name.
Merge pull request #2644 from jongerrish/do_not_return_android_attributes_that_name_match_app_attributes  Fix bug where by StyleData was incorrectly matching an android attrib…
Merge pull request #2657 from robolectric/fix-style-attr-parent-bug  Fix style attr parent bug
Merge pull request #2658 from robolectric/clearer-style-resolution-error-messages  Fix more style reference support. Clearer error messages for style debugging
adding shadow impl for readParcelableCreator  This will fix issue https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2398
adding shadow impl for readParcelableCreator  This will fix issue https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2398
Merge pull request #2737 from robolectric/fix-shadows-not-a-subtype-error  Reset main thread's context ClassLoader even if shadow resetters fail.
Fix perf issue and memory leak in ShadowParcel.

Revert "Style references should be resolved against the resource loader from the declaring AttributeSet if possible."  This reverts commit 5078a8078c01149e24ce620b9c7bf6f3417dc319.  This caused some breakages in client projects  we'll look at another way of solving this issue.
Fix test suite for Robolectric 3.1  Add a workaround until Robolectlectric is not fixed. https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2562#issuecomment-263086503
Fix test suite for Robolectric 3.1  Add a workaround until Robolectlectric is not fixed. https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2562#issuecomment-263086503
Fix test suite for Robolectric 3.1  Add a workaround until Robolectlectric is not fixed. https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2562#issuecomment-263086503
Fix test suite for Robolectric 3.1  Add a workaround until Robolectlectric is not fixed. https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2562#issuecomment-263086503
Fix bug where library R class values were not being added to the ResourceTable
Fix bug related to unsupported APIs.  Tests which specify an unsupported sdk (e.g `@Config(sdk=HONEYCOMB)`) should report that there's a problem  but only if they're not marked `@Ignore`.
Merge pull request #2777 from robolectric/multi-api-fix-old-sdk-ignored  Fix bug related to unsupported APIs.
Fix SDK range bug on JDK 7.
Fix test config error message.
Fix bug in ShadowPaint(Paint) ctor.
Adding basic Roboelectric test. Commented out until issue 2566 fixed  https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/2566
Fix favicon.ico. Add Release Notes and Issues to menu.
Fix Html.fromHtml() issue.  Instrument org.ccil.cowan.tagsoup.HTMLScanner since it calls System.arraycopy() with JVM-incompatible signature.
Merge pull request #2959 from robolectric/fix-html-array-copy  Fix Html.fromHtml() issue.
Fix Html.fromHtml() issue.  Instrument org.ccil.cowan.tagsoup.HTMLScanner since it calls System.arraycopy() with JVM-incompatible signature.
Merge pull request #2960 from robolectric/fix-canvas-gl  Fix Canvas NoClassDefFound GL error
fix up manifests  build.gradle files  debug android-play-services

Updated manifests  build files  and minor bug fixes (#1)  * fix up manifests  build.gradle files  debug android-play-services  * Updated Travis  notes on updates  * pre-merge fixups  * revert README to original version  * switch from "all" to "bin" gradle distribution
Fix ShadowPendingIntent bugs.  PiperOrigin-RevId: 154387919
Fix issues in test_anim1.xml:-  * Use a real interpolator * Use real float values rather than invalid "float" string for float attributes * Use real existing drawables in animation list.
Fix tests to not create duplicate files (this is an error with the standard JUnit TemporaryFolder rule.
Add several bug fixes and improvements to ShadowPendingIntent  Fix several broadcast PendingIntent bugs  PendingIntent comparison  flag behavior  and added cancel support among other things.
Add several bug fixes and improvements to ShadowPendingIntent  Fix several broadcast PendingIntent bugs  PendingIntent comparison  flag behavior  and added cancel support among other things.

Remove testutil subproject (#3030)  * Remove testutil subproject   Remove single class TemporaryFolder  prefer default JUnit rule and use Guava instead to write string contents to file.  * Fix tests to not create duplicate files (this is an error with the standard JUnit TemporaryFolder rule.  * Fixed test that was added later using old rule.
Medium refactoring of Scheduler and Looper.  * Run Loopers in their own thread. * Fix locking and reentrancy bugs.
Medium refactoring of Scheduler and Looper.  * Run Loopers in their own thread. * Fix locking and reentrancy bugs.
Medium refactoring of Scheduler and Looper.  * Run Loopers in their own thread. * Fix locking and reentrancy bugs.
Medium refactoring of Scheduler and Looper.  * Run Loopers in their own thread. * Fix locking and reentrancy bugs.
Medium refactoring of Scheduler and Looper.  * Run Loopers in their own thread. * Fix locking and reentrancy bugs.
Medium refactoring of Scheduler and Looper.  * Run Loopers in their own thread. * Fix locking and reentrancy bugs.
Bump assertj to latest (#3149)  Fix error prone issues.
Error prone fixed for XmlResourceParserImplTest (#3150)
Fix robolectric error when test   https://github.com/robolectric/robolectric/issues/3157

Merge pull request #3267 from robolectric/shadow_account_manager  Fixing the ShadowAccountManager so that it appropriately returns a value in getResult(). Currently the implementation is bugged in that because it posts a runnable to the scheduler. However  the implementation of getResult() doesn't block to ensure that actually works.
Fix bug in styles parsing
ShadowAlarmManager bug fix: PendingIntent equals check now includes requestCode type check.
Merge pull request #3332 from robolectric/change-156254601-robolectric_shadow_alarmmanager  ShadowAlarmManager bug fix: PendingIntent equals check now includes requestCode type check.

Separated postFrameCallback delay control from postCallback.  For some cases  introducing fixed delay for postCallback can result in incorrect application logic  so we only want to add fixed delay to postFrameCallback to work around animation problem.
Fix bug where ResTable was comparing wrong flags. Refactor ResTableTest to use ResTable.getResource() and remove testing getEntry() methods
Implemented BagAttributeFinder. Simplified more ShadowThemeTest. Fixed bug in applyStyle when entries were already present.
Fix set of ShadowThemeTests on older APIs. Implement copy-constructor for "native" theme data structures to fix bug when copying via theme.setTo.
Bug fix. License acceptance changed.
Fix string block lookup in applyStyle. Reduce spurious debug logging
Fix some bugs in attr reading.
Fix off-by-one error retaining AttributeSet attr res ids.
Fix some arithmetic errors.
Fix bug when type_info is missing.
Reuse system CppAssetManager. Cache ARSC assets (ZipSet methods must be synchronized). Fix some resource debug strings.
Fix tons of errorprone warnings.
Fix assertEquals(double  double) issue.

Activity should always have a theme.  Fixed an issue where an Activity created throguh Robolectric.setupActivity() that was not present in the AndroidManifest.xml was not being assigned as fallback the Theme from the Application.
Fix tons of errorprone warnings.
Fix assertEquals(double  double) issue.
